Method Detail

createEmptyBorder

public static final java.awt.Panel createEmptyBorder(java.awt.Component comp)
createEmptyBorder creates an empty border around the outside of the component parameter. This implementation uses the default insets, emptyBorderInsets, as defined by the GUIInterface interface.
Parameters:
comp - is a Ljava.awt.Component which to create an empty border around.
Returns:
a Ljava.awt.Panel containing the Component parameter in a padded border panel.

createEmptyBorder

public static final java.awt.Panel createEmptyBorder(java.awt.Component comp,
                                                     java.awt.Insets padding)
createEmptyBorder creates an empty border around the outside of the component parameter. This implementation uses the default insets, emptyBorderInsets, as defined by the GUIInterface interface.
Parameters:
comp - is a Ljava.awt.Component which to create an empty border around.
insets - is a Ljava.awt.Insets object specifying the padding around the top, left, bottom and right edges, constituting the border of the component.
Returns:
is a Ljava.awt.Panel containing the Component parameter in a padded border panel.
